author: Nguyen Manh Dung-2015-09-25T08:24:13-0400
title: Vietnam Airlines Golden Moment program
text:
Travel Articles | September 25, 2015 
Vietnam Airlines Golden Moment promotion will bring passengers the opportunity to own cheap Vietnam Airlines tickets to some domestic flights from September 11th to October 31st, 2015, when Vietnamese Autumn Festival is held. 
From September 9, 2015, Vietnam Airlines Corporation has launched the " Golden Moment " promotional program on some domestic flights. Accordingly, from September 11th, 2015 to October 31st, 2015, passengers will have the opportunity to own cheap Vietnam Airlines tickets to the popular destinations. The one-way ticket price is 599,000 VND/ way on the route between Ho Chi Minh - Quy Nhon; 699,000 VND/ way in flights between Ho Chi Minh City - Phu Quoc, Da Nang - Hai Phong and Hanoi - Vinh/ Dong Hoi/ Dien Bien; 799,000 VND/ way in flights between Hanoi - Quy Nhon/ Tuy Hoa/ Hue, Ho Chi Minh City - Dong Hoi; 899,000 VND/ way on the route between Ho Chi Minh City - Thanh Hoa/ Vinh/ Hai Phong; 999,000 VND/ way for routes Hanoi - Can Tho/ Pleiku/ Buon Me Thuot/ Dalat and 1,099,000 VND/ way per flight between Hanoi - Ho Chi Minh City/ Phu Quoc. To get the exact airfares, please access the website Vietnam Airlines for further information. 
The departure time is from September 11th to November 30th, 2015 (depending on the itinerary). These special prices do not include taxes, fees and surcharges and have certain conditions. For further information, please contact the booking offices, the travel agents of Vietnam Airline nationwide. The "Golden Moment" program is announced right on the occasion of the Mid-Autumn Festival; this is a great opportunity for passengers to visit family in this significant festival or for those who are passionate about exploring tourism can enjoy an impressive Moon Festival in Vietnam. 
Mid-Autumn Festival is a reunion occasion people in Asia. In Vietnam, Mid-Autumn Festival is considered the festival of children with many activities such as lantern parade and serving out a mid-autumn festival cake and fruit. Mid-Autumn Festival is held all over the country but the cities taking place mid-autumn most attractive are Hanoi, Da Nang, Hue, Hoi An and Ho Chi Minh. 
Book VN Airlines ticket to Hanoi on this occasion, you can participate in extremely exciting activities such as lantern parade, serve out a mid-autumn festival cake and fruit. Coming to Hue, you can admire the lanterns shimmering on Perfume River on the night of full moon in August, join the ceremonies characterized the style of Hue ancient imperial palace. 
Air Vietnam ticket to Da Nang on mid-autumn occasion will bring you the unforgettable experience. Walking on every street, you will feel the festive atmosphere everywhere. Dropping lantern on the nights of full moon is a unique cultural feature of Hoi An attracting numerous international tourists. On the biggest full moon night of the year, the full moon of August, Hoi An Ancient Town glows in flickering lights. 
With cheap flights to Ho Chi Minh City Vietnam , you can admire the colorful lantern street. Despite lacking the throbbing drums, Moon Festival in Saigon highlights with brilliant moon cake stalls appearing once a year and the streets brightly decorated. You can consult the detailed price list at Vietnamairlinestickets.com to choose your own suitable itinerary.   from ArticlesFactory.com ABOUT THE AUTHOR
